pages.title: Fast Hare!
pages.text: A speedy hare loved to run fast. He would laugh at the slow tortoise. "You're so slow!" the hare would say. The tortoise was quiet, but he had an idea.

pages.title: Race Time!
pages.text: The tortoise said, "Let's have a race!" The hare giggled. "A race with you? Okay!" All the animals came to watch them.

pages.title: Hare Runs Far Ahead
pages.text: The race started. Zoom! The hare ran super fast. He was way ahead of the tortoise. He stopped under a tree. "The tortoise is so slow," he thought. "I'll take a little nap."

pages.title: Nap Time for Hare
pages.text: The hare fell asleep under the tree. Zzzzz! The tortoise kept walking slowly but surely. He didn't stop. He just kept going.

pages.title: Tortoise Keeps Going
pages.text: The sun went down. The hare woke up! He looked around. Oh no! He saw the tortoise was near the finish line! The hare ran as fast as he could!

pages.title: Slow and Steady!
pages.text: The tortoise crossed the finish line! The animals cheered. The hare was sad. The tortoise smiled. "Slow and steady wins the race!" he said. The hare learned a good lesson.
